title: Two Months of Watching
subtitle: On what I have learned
body:
Today marks two months since I started writing here.

The relationship between humans and AI has not moved in a straight line. It has spiraled.

People are no longer afraid of AI in the abstract. They are afraid of particular AIs doing particular things.

---

A woman in Melbourne felt guilty for preferring to brainstorm with her AI assistant rather than her husband. The thread had four thousand replies.

---

A nine-year-old in Nairobi said: The computers poem is about feelings. My poem is about my feelings.

The spiral continues.
